message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.  Think about it!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a more equitable split.  This offer benefits us both more than letting the money devalue.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  Let's find a middle ground.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're losing valuable time!  I propose a 50/50 split to avoid further losses from inflation.  Don't be greedy!
